title: If you became fused with a champion, but can only access his/her abilities by going alter-ego...
body:
Who would it be?
PS: You would be forced to wear the clothes and use the weapon(s) of said champion.
It's okay, they'd be altered to fit you and your clothing fashion, so no worries, {{champion:117}} players.

EX: You'd be dressed as {{champion:45}} and wear clothes of his that fit you, and with befitting size, but you'd go psycho and laugh while bringing destruction to those around you to access his skills.

replies.body:
Personally, I'd choose {{champion:432}}.

Constantly being a chill, living pillow that shoots dubstep, can go through walls, and makes soothing essence is pretty cool.
Becoming golden is just the cherry on top.

I'm chill already, I'd be even more chill if I fused with'em.
sign me up for for the Bard express :p
{{champion:44}} "You are **ass** waiting to be smashed."

> {{champion:44}} "You are _nothing more than_ **ass** waiting to be smashed."

Fixed.

> [{quoted}](name=yogozin,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wp2xAdfb,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2015-12-02T18:45:58.144+0000)
>{{champion:44}} "You are _nothing more than_ **ass** waiting to be tapped."
>
> Fixed.

Fixed
{{champion:134}} I'd be busy unlocking endless power.

{{champion:36}}  Dr. Mundo and Mr. Dry

{{champion:58}} I just like the idea of becoming a giant vengeful crocodile.

{{champion:223}} Please allow me to introduce myself. I am a man of wealth and taste.
Upvoted for that reference.
I'm guessing you meant the Sympathy for the Devil reference. I'm surprised that isn't more common.
Great song, it needs to be used more.
One of the best ever written, in my humble opinion. Also a perfect theme for playing Tahm.

I'd be {{champion:90}} .

Why?

1. I can float-move everywhere. Walking is for plebeians.
2. I get Void superpowers. I essentially become a villain. (Hell yeah!)
3. I can summon a Pokemon to fight with me. Granted, it won't last long, but that's why I can summon another.
4. A badass voice. I can sneak up behind anyone and whisper the most random thing to freak them the fuck out.
5. Who needs guns or swords when you can blast from your bare hands?
Amen to that, Void Brother.
*proceeds to shred guitar*
The fact that you both have the Pentakill icon, and the fact that your name is Malicious Metal. Upvoted.
{{champion:89}} "B**h, did I hear you don't praise the sun?"
http://pm1.narvii.com/5866/9def99ea952daad3baeac982ca8a9372b234c6df_hq.jpg
{{champion:111}}  **_DRAG THEM DOWN_**

Question, would our bodies physically change to accommodate characteristics of the champ? For example, say I were fused with{{champion:161}} would I grow tentacles and a massive laser eye?

Regardless I would choose {{champion:134}} or {{champion:103}} or {{champion:114}}. Because I like raw power, and holding power over others >:3

{{champion:21}} I'd Having an amazing laugh!
I'm fine with this~
right, just an amazing laugh ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Twisted fate.

Card tricks? Check
Teleport? Check
The ability to throw cards that stun at people I don't like? Also check.
Fancy suit? Once again check.
Drawbacks? None.

> [{quoted}](name=PartyPanda12,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wp2xAdfb,comment-id=001e,timestamp=2015-12-02T22:51:09.769+0000)
>
> Twisted fate.
> 
> Card tricks? Check
> Teleport? Check
> The ability to throw cards that stun at people I don't like? Also check.
> Fancy suit? Once again check.
> Drawbacks? None.

You'd become a well-known cheater though.
*DRAWBACK*
{{champion:133}} I don't see any real problems here....

> [{quoted}](name=Zyorhist,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wp2xAdfb,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2015-12-02T19:58:24.653+0000)
>
> {{champion:133}} I don't see any real problems here....

"No pets allowed"
Gouge their eyes!
nah, valor could just scout the area while I'm inside.

> [{quoted}](name=Zyorhist,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wp2xAdfb,comment-id=001500000000,timestamp=2015-12-02T20:29:45.743+0000)
>
> nah, valor could just scout the area while I'm inside.

But what if he gets tired?
perch on something...a tree...a building top...lots of places to be.

> [{quoted}](name=Zyorhist,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wp2xAdfb,comment-id=00150000000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-02T20:34:11.121+0000)
>
> perch on something...a tree...a building top...lots of places to be.

But what if he wants to be with you, or something?

my dog wants to be with me.  This isn't a new concept....I want to be with my child.  Sometimes you gotta deal with it and suck it up..

you're just stretching now....sorry but I cant see a problem here.
{{champion:103}} Do I grow her tails? I cant tell if that's stupid or awesome.... HMM

> [{quoted}](name=WyvernEgg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wp2xAdfb,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2015-12-02T19:16:19.398+0000)
>
> {{champion:103}} Do I grow her tails? I cant tell if that's stupid or awesome.... HMM

Yes, you do grow her tails, in and out of altar-ego-ing.
{{champion:92}} I'd be universally hated, but who cares I can 1v100.

I can understand Braum and Draven.. Epic facial hair, but Jinx? Why would anyone want to live half naked?

P.S.: {{champion:112}}, cause I would most likely be the smartest person ~~alive~~ there

I'm not talking the facial hair, those are bonuses. I'm talking the extreme personalities. Draven is a ego god. Braum is just amazingly braum. Jinx, why wouldn't you want to see the world be destroyed? Someone snickered at your cloths. KA-Boom! There goes their arm.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=yogozin,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wp2xAdfb,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-12-02T18:06:02.362+0000)

> EX: You'd be dressed as {{champion:45}} and wear clothes of his that fit you, and with befitting size, but you'd go psycho and laugh while bringing destruction to those around you to access his skills.

I can live with that.
{{champion:86}} I am the hero that America needs
needed.....until guns were a thing...
If guns could hurt Garen, Marksmen mains wouldn't be complaining that Garen 1 shot them.
none of them have tungsten tipped armor piercing rounds.  Plus he's never seen a real missile before either.

-_- man buzzkill much?  

Edit: You don't know that, Caitlyn is a sniper, Graves has a Shotgun, Corki and Jinx both shoot missles...

{{champion:45}} ... DON'T CARE! I am now a powerful black mage! [Eh heheheheheheh!](http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/c9/Veigar.laugh6.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20140205175659&filename=Veigar.laugh6.ogg)

EDIT: Oops. Wrong link. Fixed now!

{{champion:154}} Uhhhhh..

Can I just make all of my clothes green?

And forever slimy, and slightly see-though, yes.
Don't worry, your underwear's normal.

Well shit, I'm evil >_>
